issue.title: Give error more quickly when pyarrow serialization context is used incorrectly.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3611](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3611). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When `type_id` is not a string or can't be cast to a string, `register_type` will succeed, but `_deserialize_callback` can fail.
